name: tm39
effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Swift)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Stops the foe from
moving with rocks.
May lower SPEED.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Stops the foe from
moving with rocks.
May lower SPEED.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
SPEED if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It may also make the
target flinch.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s
Speed.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It lowers the foe’s
Speed.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Boulders are hurled at the target. It
also lowers the target’s Speed by
preventing its movement.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Boulders are hurled at the target. It
also lowers the target’s Speed by
preventing its movement.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
This also lowers the target’s Speed
stat by preventing its movement.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
This also lowers the target’s Speed
stat by preventing its movement.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Boulders are hurled at the target.
This also lowers the target’s Speed
stat by preventing its movement.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The Pokémon rampages and attacks for two to
three turns. It then becomes confused.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This attack move doubles its power if the user is
poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.
